campaign to push the Columbus Republican toward the White House. A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, state Mike Pence Kris Crawford said.`` We would like him on the ballot.'' Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter to Mike Pence this week.

Colin Powell thinks that America`` isn't quite post-racial'' at this time.`` These problems still exist in post-racial America.'' However, he suggested that Henry Louis Gates should not have argued with the policeman arresting him. You don't argue with a police officer, he says.
